title: Shaco clone with Eye of the Equinox or Face of the mountain procs on both himself and on the clone

replies.body: A better question: Why the hell is _Shaco_ building support items.

compared to his old kit, his damage is extremely low. you cant clear krugs or raptors until about the 8-9 minute mark, so why not just build him tank ap. boxes are stronger now ( and hp scales slightly), and especially with this mechanic, it makes tower dives free from about 15 mins on. you really shouldnt end a game with over 3k gold on an Eye of the equinox. (average timed game)
